title: Script
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content: Morris Fuller Benton's **Announcement Roman**. Revivals/digitizations: [Odette](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/odette) (using alternate / [A](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/odette/alt/glyphs.html#glyphs/247675/12) and squooshing it), [Society Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/society-page-nf), [Friendly](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/friendly), Opti Announcement, [Garton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055819/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/garton)
